content.body: shu: The delegates meeting is happening right now, right?
content.formatted_body: shu: The delegates meeting is happening right now, right?

content.body: Or wait, now I'm confused; the email said "Finalizing the time to June 10, 9:00 - 10:00 AM PDT." but the gh issue says "June 17"
Ah, found the issue. @shu fyi for next time, don't *just* edit comments with important new information, because edits aren't reflected into email. Edit *and* post a new comment, plz
content.formatted_body: Ah, found the issue. @shu fyi for next time, don't just edit comments with important new information, because edits aren't reflected into email. Edit and post a new comment, plz

content.body:
> <@tabatkins:matrix.org> Ah, found the issue. @shu fyi for next time, don't *just* edit comments with important new information, because edits aren't reflected into email. Edit *and* post a new comment, plz

AFAICT, unless the issue title is updated, the email title won't change. So edit the issue title will help in the condition too.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @tabatkins:matrix.org
Ah, found the issue. @shu fyi for next time, don't just edit comments with important new information, because edits aren't reflected into email. Edit and post a new comment, plz
AFAICT, unless the issue title is updated, the email title won't change. So edit the issue title will help in the condition too.

content.body: legendecas: Yes, tho changing the email title is a bit fraught anyway - it might not be very obvious, depending on your client, or it might break the message threading so now you have to realize there's a new email thread continuing the convo.

content.body: tabatkins: Hey, are you going to organize further work on the pipeline operator?

content.body: yeah, I sent tabatkins a list a couple months ago of people who expressed interest. If he's not available to organize, then I could send it to someone else to get the group together.
